T02D3605:229a-1: ba su dh'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3605:229a-4: nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3605:229a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir bam yig ser
T02D3605:229a-6: po yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ser mo
T02D3605:229a-7: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyan
T02D3605:229a-8: dang na bzas rnam par brgyan pa 'bras kyi snye
T02D3605:229a-9: ma dang rin po che'i char 'bab bzhin pa'i bum
T02D3605:229a-10: pa phyag g-yon na bsnams na /
T02D3605:229a-11: phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa /
T02D3605:229a-12: dpag tu med pa'i grogs mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
T02D3605:229a-13: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3605:229a-14: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3605:229a-15: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las skad cig gis bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3605:229a-16: lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas nas /
T02D3605:229a-17: gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni nor rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3605:229a-18: de nas aom ba su dh'a r'a ratna ni dh'a na kshe tre sv'a h'a /
T02D3605:229a-19: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
